product_name: Black Diamond Trail Pro Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Black Diamond Trail Pro women's trekking poles combine double FlickLock Pro adjustability and comfortable foam grips with light, durable aluminum shafts to help stabilize you and enhance your treks.
short_description: Black Diamond Trail Pro women's trekking poles combine double FlickLock Pro adjustability and comfortable foam grips with light, durable aluminum shafts to help stabilize you and enhance your treks.
